Text.Page:
The plants in these territories...they don't grow. And they don't die. They just sort of...are.

I'm sure it's related to the noctenium, but I'm not sure how. Bring me some of the seeds from those plants so I can examine them. Maybe we can find a way to repurpose such an effect.

Youâ€™ve brought perfect specimens.
I will give them to our researchers.
